snippet.title: Krimson | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Krimson is a challenging gritty rhythm platformer featuring heavy electronic metal music where you're an unknown spawn moving through a hellish world as it shifts rhythmically to the music. Platforms, obstacles, hazards, objects, and rules change in synch with music, the heart of this game. This game is an interactive industrial electronic techno dubstep metal album so prepare your finest headphones for this one; your ears will thank you for it!

Coming 2023.
